-- in --
A,  B, C $
x,  1, i $
y, 20, ii$
-- default --
-- want --
A,"  B"," C "
x,"  1"," i "
y," 20"," ii"
-- trim --
{"Trim": true}
-- want --
A,B,C $
x,1,i $
y,20,ii$
-- in --
A,B
1,2"
-- default --
-- err --
parse error on line 2, column 4: bare " in non-quoted-field
-- lazy --
{"Lazy": true}
-- want --
A,B
1,"2"""
